qas.question: What replaced the Windows Explorer comman bar?
What is the new name of Windows Explorer?
What did the update of operation dalog boxes help with?

answers.text: provide more detailed statistics, the ability to pause file transfers, and improvements in the ability to manage conflicts when copying files

qas.question: What does file history make possible?

answers.text: allows incremental revisions of files to be backed up to and restored from a secondary storage device

plausible_answers.text: provide more detailed statistics, the ability to pause file transfers, and improvements

plausible_answers.text: provide more detailed statistics, the ability to pause file transfers, and improvements

qas.question: What didn't the update of operation dalog boxes help with?

plausible_answers.text: allows incremental revisions of files to be backed up to and restored from a secondary storage device

qas.question: What does file history make impossible?
